data.name: Shachibato! × Hyperdimension Neptunia Collaboration 2
data.detailed_description:
Additional characters from the Hyperdimension Neptunia series comes to Shachibato! Join forces together to help rebuild the company!

Contents


Noire will join as an employee.
Vert will join as an employee.
Blanc will join as an employee.
*She will appear at the recruitment office on the rare employee appearance day.
*You will need to unlock the recruitment office first by clearing the 10th day defensive battle."

Volcano Dive will be added to artifacts.
Sylhet Spear will be added to artifacts.
Gefahrlichtern will be added to artifacts.
*You will have to get in the dungeon.
*You will need to unlock the equipment function first by clearing the 10th day defensive battle.

Adds new dungeon ZEKA 1 Ruin.
Adds new dungeon Fantasy Zone.

Dogoo will appear as an enemy.
Giant Dogoo will appear as an enemy.
Killachine will appear as an enemy.

fullgame.name: Shachibato! President, It's Time for Battle! Maju Wars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1 GB or better graphics card that can support DirectX 12.0 or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
